metadata.title: CVE-2024-11274 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 16.1 prior to 17.4.6, starting from 17.5 prior to 17.5.4, and startingfrom 17.6 prior to 17.6.2, injection of NEL headers in k8s proxy responsecould lead to session data exfiltration.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
